title: Week 1: Introduction to HTML
description: This week covers the fundamental building blocks of the web: HTML. We will explore semantic tags, document structure, and basic elements like headings, paragraphs, links, and images.

title: Week 2: Introduction to CSS
description: Learn how to style your HTML documents. We will cover selectors, the box model, colors, fonts, and basic layouts.

title: Week 3: CSS Flexbox and Grid
description: A deep dive into modern CSS layout techniques. We will master Flexbox for 1D layouts and CSS Grid for 2D layouts.
